title: Candle In The Wind
lyrics: Goodbye Norma Jean, though I neve r knew you at all You had the grace to hold yourself while those around you crawled They crawled out of the w oodwork and they whispered into your brain They sent you on a tread mill and they made you change your name And it seems to me you lived your li fe Like a c andle in the wind Never kn owing who to cling to when the r ain set in And I would have liked to've known you but I was ju st a kid Your candle burned out lo ng before your l egend ever did
